name: Yet another Castle Defense
description:
Left click - shoot arrow

Archer towers automatically shoot at the closest enemy. Press Shift+click to let them attack at mouse cursor instead.

If you lose a level then check your upgrade strategy. Early, precision and attack speed are the way to go. There's no point in getting upgraded king damage before lvl3. Investing in archer towers pays off a lot.

There is no boss yet, after 10 waves the last wave repeats indefinitely.
